Module kivakit.microservice

Package com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.protocols.rest.http

package com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.protocols.rest.http
  • Class
    Description
    HttpProblem
    Represents a problem with an associated HttpStatus code.
    RestClient
    A client for easy interaction with KivaKit RestServices.
    Restful
    Base interface for RestRequest and RestResponse, as well as MicroservletRequest and MicroservletResponse.
    RestPath
    A request path and method for a Microservlet
    RestProblemReportingTrait
    Allows reporting of problems and status through the RestResponse.
    RestRequest
    Interface for abstracting HTTP REST requests
    RestRequestCycle
    A Jetty HTTP request/response cycle.
    RestRequestThread
    Maintains a thread-local RestRequestCycle.
    RestResponse
    Interface for abstracting HTTP REST requests
    RestService
    Base class for KivaKit microservice REST applications.
